name: Mad Dog McCree
overview: There's trouble in old Tuscon. Mad Dog McCree and his gang have kidnapped the town's Mayor and his daughter. To save the town, you will be challenged by a saloon full of outlaws, a hair-raising bank robbery, gunfighters, a slew of old West ambushes, and Mad Dog himself. Blaze your way into town and blast the desperadoes in a classic live-action shooting game!
